global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text module_class=”titleGreen” _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_margin=”||28px|||” header_2_text_align_tablet=”center” header_2_text_align_phone=”” header_2_text_align_last_edited=”on|phone” header_2_font_size_tablet=”” header_2_font_size_phone=”40px” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

A Local’s Guide to Minneapolis

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”|300|||||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.9em” text_orientation=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]

When hearing about the city of Minneapolis, it’s often underestimated as the frozen farmland most people imagine it to be. Minneapolis is the definition of a hidden gem. From its many cool hotels, delicious eateries, and historic art museums and sculpture gardens to its friendly communities— it’s no wonder Expedia named it one of the friendliest cities in America.

No matter your reason for coming to Minneapolis— whether for school, work, or retirement— there are some places and activities you can’t miss. As one of the most walkable cities in the U.S., Minneapolis is perfect for exploring on foot. And with more than 20 lakes within the city limits, you’re never far from water. After all, it’s not called the “City of Lakes” for nothing.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text module_class=”titleGreen” _builder_version=”4.19.0″ _module_preset=”default” header_font=”|700|||||||” header_font_size=”50px” header_2_font=”|700|||||||” header_2_text_align=”left” header_2_text_color=”#000000″ header_2_font_size=”50px” custom_margin=”11%||2px||false|false” hover_enabled=”0″ header_2_text_align_tablet=”center” header_2_text_align_phone=”” header_2_text_align_last_edited=”on|phone” header_2_font_size_tablet=”” header_2_font_size_phone=”40px” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″]

Everything is Within Reach

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” width=”67%” width_tablet=”” width_phone=”90%” width_last_edited=”on|phone” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”1px|||||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”|300|||||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.9em” text_orientation=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Dubbed the most populous city in Minnesota state, the largest metropolitan area in the state is the contiguous Minneapolis-St. Paul and their suburban communities. Minneapolis has been a hub of activity for many years due to its strategic location near the Mississippi River and Minneapolis-St Paul International Airport. This airport is a Delta hub with flights to destinations all around the world, and it’s also the home base for Sun Country Airlines, which serves the U.S., Mexico, Central America, and the Caribbean. Minneapolis is a convenient and accessible destination for travelers worldwide, with plenty of flights available for both residents and visitors. The city is also easy to get around by car, with major highways running through it from all directions.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”3_5,2_5″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”3_5″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.18.1″ _module_preset=”default” header_3_font=”|700|||||||” header_3_text_color=”#068fd7″ header_3_font_size=”20px” custom_margin=”||4px|||” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Minneapolis’ Rich History

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.18.1″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”|300|||||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.9em” custom_margin=”||40px||false|false” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Nicknamed the “twin cities,” Minneapolis and St. Paul have a long and intertwined history that began when the two towns were founded beside the Mississippi river. Early settlers used the falls to generate power for sawmills and flour mills, making Minneapolis the world’s flour milling capital. By the 20th century, Minneapolis was a thriving industrial town famous for its flour mills and food processing plants. Today, the twin cities are known for their vibrant culture, diverse population, and beautiful scenery.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.18.1″ _module_preset=”default” header_3_font=”|700|||||||” header_3_text_color=”#068fd7″ header_3_font_size=”20px” custom_margin=”5px||4px||false|false” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Culture and Attractions

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.18.1″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”|300|||||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.9em” custom_margin=”||40px||false|false” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Minneapolis is a city abundant in natural resources— something that enhances the quality of life for its locals and makes it a great place to visit. It is surrounded by water boasting around 22 lakes and the home to the Mississippi River, which provides plenty of opportunities to enjoy the outdoors. A few highlights include the 34-acre Loring Park, the Minneapolis Sculpture Garden, and the incredible 170-acre Minnehaha Park with the video-perfect Minnehaha Falls. The Chain of Lakes Regional Park includes Brownie Lake, Cedar Lake, Lake of the Isles, Bde Maka Ska, Lake Harriet, Lyndale Park Gardens, and Roberts Bird Sanctuary— all with family-fun music, biking, beaches, canoeing, fishing, and ice skating in the winter.

Minneapolis is known for extreme winter conditions, nevertheless, the winter Holidazzle parade is a big hit with locals and tourists alike, even though it means braving the cold weather. The July Aquatennial parade is also well-attended.

Some of Minneapolis’ most famous landmarks include the Basilica of Saint Mary, a popular spot for art, music, and Catholic services; and the Guthrie Theater, which houses three theaters and features a beautiful Endless Bridge on the fourth floor that overlooks the Mississippi river and old mill district.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”2_5″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://www.worryfreelawnmn.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/10/Worry_Free_Lawn_Care_Snow_Minneapolis1.jpg” title_text=”Worry_Free_Lawn_Care_Snow_Minneapolis1″ _builder_version=”4.18.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”2_5,3_5″ _builder_version=”4.18.1″ _module_preset=”default” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”2_5″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://www.worryfreelawnmn.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/10/Worry_Free_Lawn_Care_Snow_Minneapolis3.jpg” title_text=”Worry_Free_Lawn_Care_Snow_Minneapolis3″ _builder_version=”4.18.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”3_5″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.18.1″ _module_preset=”default” header_3_font=”|700|||||||” header_3_text_color=”#068fd7″ header_3_font_size=”20px” custom_margin=”||4px|||” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Weather

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.18.1″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”|300|||||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.9em” custom_margin=”||40px||false|false” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Despite the long and cold winter weather it’s known for, there’s no denying that Minneapolis has some of the best weather around, with all four seasons offering something special.

Summers in Minneapolis can be hot and humid but always packed with things to do outdoors in the parks and waterways. There are also plenty of opportunities to socialize on patios and rooftops when the weather is just right. Minneapolis has one of the best lawn care services like Worry Free Lawn Care which has been in service of Minneapolis residents for 26 years for lawn mowing and landscaping.

Winters can be harsh in Minneapolis with sometimes having below-zero temperatures, but that doesn’t stop the hearty Minnesotan. Minneapolis has some of the best snow removal services like Worry Free Lawn Care which has been in service of Minneapolis residents for 26 years to clear roads of snow quickly. Residents still make it to work by enjoying the Winter season and savoring outdoor activities such as snowmobiling, skiing, snow tubing, and ice fishing.

As the chilly winter season gradually comes to an end, Spring takes its place with an array of colors, flowers in bloom, and trees and birds returning. Minnesota not only does it have 10,000 lakes but is also blessed with breathtaking natural scenery. As the weather gets warmer, people start dusting off their bicycles, motorcycles, and convertibles and taking them out for a spin. Boats once again dot the lakes and rivers.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ prev_background_color=”#ffffff” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#063ab0″ background_image=”https://worryfreelawnmn.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/11/worry-free-leaf-bg3.png” background_size=”initial” background_position=”bottom_left” background_repeat=”repeat-x” background_blend=”exclusion” vertical_offset=”0px” top_divider_style=”waves” top_divider_height=”25px” top_divider_repeat=”0x” top_divider_arrangement=”above_content” bottom_divider_height=”32px” bottom_divider_repeat=”0x” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”|800|||||||” text_text_color=”#c2db0c” text_font_size=”40px” text_letter_spacing=”-1px” header_2_font=”Raleway|700|||||||” header_2_text_color=”#c2db0c” header_2_font_size=”50px” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”||-2px|||” text_text_shadow_style=”preset1″ global_colors_info=”{}”]

CALL WORRY FREE LAWN CARE TODAY

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Text” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”|||on|||||” text_text_color=”#ffffff” text_font_size=”24px” text_orientation=”center” background_layout=”dark” custom_margin=”||41px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”]

We can also take care of light tree trimming, hedge trimming, and more.
free estimate on how we can prepare your yard – whether it’s your home or business.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”tel:6127296610″ url_new_window=”on” button_text=”Call (612) 729-6610 ” button_alignment=”center” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” custom_button=”on” button_text_size=”25px” button_text_color=”#ffffff” button_border_radius=”15px” button_font=”Merriweather Sans|600||on|||||” background_layout=”dark” global_colors_info=”{}” button_bg_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” button_bg_color__hover=”#c2db0c” button_bg_enable_color__hover=”on”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.7.2″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#161616″ custom_padding=”||34px|||” global_module=”381″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_4,1_2,1_4″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”3″ make_equal=”on” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”|300|||||||” text_text_color=”#ffffff” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.5em” text_orientation=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Lawn Mowing / Lawn Care – Commercial Lawn Services – Lawn Maintenance – Yard Trimming and Blowing – Spring and Fall Cleanup – Dethatching – Yard Aerating – Hedge Trimming – Mulching / Garden Maintenance / Planting – Snow Removal

Find Us On The Web[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://worryfreelawnmn.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/11/worryfreelogo.png” title_text=”worryfreelogo” align=”center” force_fullwidth=”on” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”|300|||||||” text_text_color=”#ffffff” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.5em” text_orientation=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]

We proudly serve the following communities:
Minneapolis, St Paul, Bloomington, Columbia Heights, Inver Grove Heights, Maplewood, Mendota Heights, New Brighton, ​and Richfield

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
